tasks.task: Conduct a farming project to improve a family farm and create a value-added product.
subtasks: Express gratitude to the grant provider.
Highlight the project's educational value.
Describe the farm's location and facilities.
Explain the motivation for returning to family farming.
Mention the peak number of CSA members and farming details.
Detail the fermenting project and process.
Describe soil fertility management techniques.
Explain the use of chickens for fertilization.
Discuss cover crop challenges and solutions.
Present results from the cover crop project.
Highlight tools and equipment used in the project.
Present a comparison of seeding methods for cover crops.
Share the impact of no-till practices on tomato yield.
Present cost analysis of agricultural equipment.
Elaborate on reduced tillage practices.
